articles.title: S&P 500 Gains and Losses Today: Tech Stocks Bounce Back After Soft Inflation Data - Investopedia
articles.description: The S&P 500 added 0.5% on Wednesday, March 12, after a key inflation report showed consumer prices increased at a slower-than-expected pace last month.
